revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ARGtek |model=ARG-1210 |revision= |asin= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/02/2011 |fcc_id=VYXWIFI-012 |pcb_id=AWRN2124_V03 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q16BVSIG |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM639165TS-6G |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|PowerKing-X Router}} :[http://www.argtek.com/style/frame/templates1/product_detail.asp?lang=2&customer_id=1718&name_id=59305&content_set=&rid=56306&id=301119 Product page]
*[http://www.dealextreme.com/p/1000mw-2-4ghz-300mbps-802-11b-g-n-wlan-ap-router-71892 On DealExtreme]
The FCC manual states the default IP address is 192.168.1.254. :"AWRN2124_V03" is silkscreened on the board.
Specs per FCC internal photos may differ from reality (DX forums and ARGtek :specs indicate the device actually has [http://xn----8sbafotoqlagnhme.xn--p1ai 2MB Flash]), device appears to have :a ''Macronix'' MX29LV320DBTI-70G 4MB Flash in FCC photos.
